ModuleDescription: This module has two main objectives: to introduce analysis in the setting of metric spaces and to present multivariable differential calculus at a more advanced level. Major topics: Metric spaces and examples, topology of metric spaces, convergence of sequences., completeness, continuity of functions and uniform continuity, compactness, contraction mappings, Banachâ€™s fixed point theorem, differentiable functions from Rn to Rm, inverse function theorem and implicit function theorem.
Prerequisite: (MA3110 or MA3110S) and (MA1104 or MA2104 or MA1507)
